description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/net/sign-in.html)

1. Click on ***Settings***.
2. Click ***Edit Holidays & Days Off*** and then select the appropriate booking calendar.
3. Click ***Add Holiday/Free Day*** to make the setting individually.
4. Click on ***German Holidays*** to set the German holidays. These can then still be edited individually.
5. Optionally assign a title for the day off or the vacation.
6. Select the date and time range.
7. The settings can optionally be applied to other or all calendars.
8. Click ***Appointment booking is not possible*** to block the corresponding appointment slot for the appointment booking. The days or times are not displayed in the appointment booking calendar.
9. Click on ***Appointment booking is possible*** to unblock the corresponding appointment slot for the appointment booking. The days or times are displayed again in the appointment booking calendar.
10. Click on ***Save*** to apply the settings.
title: Set vacations and days off
